questiontext.text:
Exercise

Find the values of the following integrals giving your answers to \(4\) d.p.

  1. \({\displaystyle\int_{@l1@}^{@u1@} {@exp1@} \, \mathrm{d}x} = \) [[input:ans1]] [[validation:ans1]] [[feedback:prt1]]
  2. \({\displaystyle\int_{@l2@}^{@u2@} {@exp2@} \, \mathrm{d}x} = \) [[input:ans2]] [[validation:ans2]] [[feedback:prt2]]

generalfeedback.text:
[[facts:calc_int_methods_parts]]

  1. First we find \(\displaystyle \frac{d}{dx}\left({@f1@}\right)\) and \(\displaystyle \int {@g1@} \, \mathrm{d}x\). \[\begin{aligned} \frac{d}{dx}\left({@f1@}\right) &= {@df1@} \\ \int {@g1@}\,\mathrm{d}x &= {@ig1@} \end{aligned}\]

    The formula then gives \[\begin{aligned} \int_{{@l1@}}^{{@u1@}} {@exp1@} \,\mathrm{d}x &= \Bigg[\left({@f1@}\right) \cdot \left({@ig1@}\right)\Bigg]_{{@l1@}}^{{@u1@}} - \int_{{@l1@}}^{{@u1@}} \left({@df1@}\right) \cdot \left({@ig1@}\right) \,\mathrm{d}x \\ &= \Bigg[{@fig1@}\Bigg]_{{@l1@}}^{{@u1@}} - \Bigg[{@idfig1@}\Bigg]_{{@l1@}}^{{@u1@}} \\ &= \left({@u12@} - \left({@u11@}\right)\right) - \left({@v12@} - \left({@v11@}\right)\right) \\ &= {@ta1@}. \end{aligned}\]

  2. First we find \(\displaystyle \frac{d}{dx}\left({@f2@}\right)\) and \(\displaystyle \int {@g2@} \, \mathrm{d}x\). \[\begin{aligned} \frac{d}{dx}\left({@f2@}\right) &= {@df2@} \\ \int {@g2@}\,\mathrm{d}x &= {@ig2@} \end{aligned}\]

    The formula then gives \[\begin{aligned} \int_{{@l2@}}^{{@u2@}} {@exp2@} \,\mathrm{d}x &= \Bigg[\left({@f2@}\right) \cdot \left({@ig2@}\right)\Bigg]_{{@l2@}}^{{@u2@}} - \int_{{@l2@}}^{{@u2@}} \left({@df2@}\right) \cdot \left({@ig2@}\right) \,\mathrm{d}x \\ &= \Bigg[{@fig2@}\Bigg]_{{@l2@}}^{{@u2@}} - \Bigg[{@idfig2@}\Bigg]_{{@l2@}}^{{@u2@}} \\ &= \left({@u22@} - \left({@u21@}\right)\right) - \left({@v22@} - \left({@v21@}\right)\right) \\ &= {@ta2@}. \end{aligned}\]
